name: Salesforce Partner Contact - NetSuite Partner Contact
description: When there is a new/updated object in Salesforce, create list and other actions

input.query: PublishingStatus__c IN ('Requested', 'Published') AND Account.RecordType.Name= 'Partner' AND Account.PublishingStatus__c = 'Published' AND LastModifiedById NOT IN (SELECT Id FROM User WHERE Alias = 'workato')
